sub_title: Data Scientist | Analytics | Business Intelligence | SQL | Python | Power BI | Looker
summary:
Over the last 4+ yrs, I have worked in E-Commerce, Retail, Banking, Finance, Software domains and across technologies like Python, R, SQL, Looker, Power BI to provide solutions for problems like Consumer Credit Risk Screening, Financial Forecasting, Management and Operational Dashboarding, and Customer Journey Mapping to name a few. 

For my company, this has meant tangible growth in their business as measured by increased clientele, increased revenue, reduced FTE hours, and optimal project life-cycles.

Outside of work, I am a big fan of blues, jazz, garlic bread and its immense potential to solve world hunger. If you, too, are passionate about data science (or food or music) and its applications, feel free to reach out and connect with me on LinkedIn.

education.field_of_study: Major in Computer Studies with Double Minors in Economics, and Mathematics & Statistics

projects.title: The Presence of Scale-Free and Small World Properties in US Airport Networks (Python 3.x and networkx)
projects.description: Using Python (numpy, networkx, matplotlib packages), our team worked on plotting top US airports as a weighted graph, understanding the properties by utilizing measures such as degree connectivity, centrality measures (closeness, betweenness, eigenvector), to find out how the properties of our graph compare to that of scale-free networks and small world networks. The result was that the graph was both scale-free and small world.

projects.title: Smarty Lot
projects.description: Generated an idea, managed this mini project, created a Proof of Concept by the end of my tenure as an intern. The idea (detailed description can be found in the link) was to include Internet of Things and the Raspberry Pi along with a few other devices to provide a solution to the problem of parking spaces in cities like Pune and Bombay. My contribution was in terms of management of the project, delivery of the project, sourcing the necessary equipment,and programming on the Raspberry Pi. I am thankful to all my team members and my mentor for helping me throughout the project.

profile_positions.description: Mendix is a leading enterprise low-code application development platform. The Mendix Platform enables continuous collaboration between those who build the software and those who use it – this accelerates the application development lifecycle and supports iterative deployment at scale. The Mendix Platform has been adopted by more than 4,000 leading companies around the world. Mendix is a Siemens business.
profile_positions.title: Data Analyst - Strategy | Finance (Central Analytics)

profile_positions.description:
Citi's mission is to serve as a trusted partner to our clients by responsibly providing financial services that enable growth and economic progress. Our core activities are safeguarding assets, lending money, making payments and accessing the capital markets on behalf of our clients. We have 200 years of experience helping our clients meet the world's toughest challenges and embrace its greatest opportunities.

> Accurately forecasted High Yield Saving Accounts revenue, including cross sell opportunities, during
my first 6 months on the job. Mentored new team members on retail products & financial forecasting.

> Successfully delivered the Digital Acquisition Strategy Plan for 2H 2021 with million dollar implications. Awarded Bronze for this achievement.

> Leveraged Adobe Analytics, Hive, PySpark to understand user journeys for retail banking products and help improve conversion rates.

Working at Citi taught me a lot about big-picture thinking and handling data at scale. The projects I was entrusted with were very strategic and allowed me to understand consumer behavior and consumer banking deeply. I am really grateful to my team and managers for their trust, patience, support and for giving me the opportunity to do my best.
profile_positions.title: Specialized Analytics Officer - Banking | Finance (Digital Strategy & Analytics)

profile_positions.description:
Nupanch is a boutique Analytics Consulting firm specializing in E-Commerce and Retail. They are dedicated to crafting bespoke analytics solutions including, but not limited to, business intelligence, data warehousing, data analytics and data science.

> Successfully contributed to ~25% of the revenue from my 2nd month of joining. Worked with programming languages & technologies such as Looker, SQL (PostgreSQL, AWS Redshift, Google BigQuery, Presto), Magento BI, Mode Analytics and Python.

> Successfully completed over 50 projects for 5 clients over the period of one year and contributed to 2x growth in revenue for the company.

> Had exposure to and interactions with CXO's and Managers throughout my tenure.

Here I learnt the importance of RDBMS, data stores, data warehousing concepts, ETL (or ELT, rather), and a whole lot of SQL analytics. Really grateful to Nupanch for introducing me to SQL, Looker, data warehousing and data analytics and giving me responsibilities to work with senior client team members.
profile_positions.title: Analytics Consultant - eCommerce | Retail

profile_positions.description:
Springboard India is an E-Learning organization that focuses on upskilling individuals in the space of data science and analytics through their dedicated coursework and career tracks. 

Working with Springboard India on demystifying data science - one article at a time. 

Check out my latest article at: https://in.springboard.com/blog/what-is-data-science-in-simple-words/
profile_positions.title: Contributing Writer - Data Science Tech | Non-Tech

profile_positions.description:
Extentia® is a global technology and services firm that helps clients transform and realize their digital strategies.

> Successfully contributed to the company’s Data Intelligence Practice (DIP) through my roles in creating analytics proposals, hiring, requirements gathering, data visualization, and statistical modeling. This laid the foundation for upcoming data science and business intelligence projects.

> Pioneered IoT projects at Extentia with Dweet, SAP SCP (HANA, IoT 4.0, Leonardo), RPi, Python. This led to future projects with the same multinational client. 

> Linear Regression, Logistic Regression, CART, and other Ensemble methods were some of my key weapons of choice.

Super grateful for having an excellent team to work with, an excellent manager and some great responsibilities to improve my time management and project management skills; business analyst and data science skills. Even as a junior employee I was entrusted with responsibilities that would impact the company's client relations and brand.
profile_positions.title: Jr. Software Professional - IoT | Finance

profile_positions.description:
Extentia® is a global technology and services firm that helps clients transform and realize their digital strategies. 

> Successfully managed and delivered a project on IoT involving a smart parking lot (SmartyLot) with Raspberry Pi, Ultrasonic Sensors and an Android App. The same prototype was later extended in 2019 and developed upon by another team.

> Successfully demonstrated the utilities and use-cases for over 28 gadgets to various clients and internal stakeholders. 

> Managed 28+ different devices by testing and preparing them for end users. Documented and demonstrated the use-cases for multiple devices to internal and external stakeholders.

> Added to the Innovation initiative of the company (Techquarium) by generating ideas, making prototypes and implementing the ideas.

Really happy that Extentia took a chance on an intern from a Liberal Arts background and gave me important stuff to do. Incidentally, also one of the reasons why I was scouted to join them as a FTE after graduation.
profile_positions.title: Summer Intern - Techquarium

volunteer_experiences.description:
Interned at The Hope Foundation in Calcutta for a duration of 2 months as a part of our college's Community Outreach Programme.

Responsibilities undertaken during my tenure and accomplishments:

1. Worked as group lead on a campaign against child labor on the World Day Against Child Labor (12th June). Conducted a successful campaign and raised funds for the cause. 

2. Worked on a Flash Mob to raise awareness about Child Labor in India. Successfully executed the task with applause and public credit. 

3. Worked as a teacher at Nabadisha Project (Education project). The work involved teaching children subjects like Math and English, translating, assisting in designing a lesson plan for July, 2015, and conducting case studies of 8 children. Designed effective curriculum and successfully taught fundamental Mathematics and elementary English to 5th to 10th graders.
Volunteered in the capacity of a Student Coordinator for the Symbiosis Summer School at SIU, Lavale for the 3-week long program.
Volunteered as a USIEF representative in the USIEF pavilion at the Book Fair.
Volunteered as a SSLA student representative and tech support for the Future of Liberal Arts and Science Education conference.
